title: section 21A of the Electoral Act 1997 (No. 25 of 1997) is varied to €250,000, in
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Act 1997 (Variation of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Act 1997 (Variation of 

Monetary Amount) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited electoral act 1997 (variation monetary amount) order 2025

title: section 21A of the Electoral Act 1997 (No. 25 of 1997) is varied to €250,000, in
heading: 2. The monetary amount specified in paragraph (b) (inserted by section 5(1)
text_raw:
2. The monetary amount specified in paragraph (b) (inserted by section 5(1) 
of the Electoral (Amendment) Act 2011 (No. 14 of 2011)) of subsection (1) of 
section 21A of the Electoral Act 1997 (No. 25 of 1997) is varied to €250,000, in 
lieu of €200,000. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 July, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st August, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [383] 3

title: section 21A of the Electoral Act 1997 (No. 25 of 1997) is varied to €250,000, in
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order amends section 21A(1)(b) of the Electoral Act 1997 (No. 25 of 1997) 
to provide for the reimbursement to a candidate at a presidential election of 
his/her actual expenses incurred or €250,000 whichever is the less, subject to 
fulfilling the criteria prescribed in section 21A(1)(a) of the aforesaid Act. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [383] 

€ 1.50 

(FS-39) 30. 7/25. Propylon.
